description: This file defines a data model for movie scripts using Pydantic, and sets up two agent instances for generating movie scripts via OpenAI models, including asynchronous calls to produce responses.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing the structure of a movie script, including setting, ending, genre, name, characters, and storyline.

methods.name: structured_output_agent
methods.description: An Agent instance configured to generate movie scripts using a specific OpenAI model.

methods.name: json_mode_agent
methods.description: An Agent instance configured to generate movie scripts in JSON mode.
